674240.name: Overdriven Reloaded: The Original Soundtrack
674240.description:
The Original soundtrack of the video game "Overdriven Reloaded: Special Edition" !
Composed, Played and recorded by Thomas Casamento.

15 tracks + 2 bonus tracks.

01 - Main Theme
02 - The Space Station
03 - Conviction
04 - The Hero Of The Situation
05 - Mysterious Place
06 - Rock’n’Roll Destruction
07 - I See The Light
08 - Boss Theme
09 - Stress Zone
10 - Asteroids Rush
11 - End Theme
12 - Main Theme Launched
13 - Back To The Sea
14 - Back To The Light
15 - Classical Attack 01
16 - (Bonus Track) I See The Light - Long Intro
17 - (Bonus Track) Classical Attack 01 - 2010 Version

Available in both mp3 and Flac.
